thread.title: Dashlane Customer
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Dashlane Customer

author: Dashlane Customer
title: Dashlane Customer
text: Larry Spokes is the person who helped with the purchase of our first mattress and our second mattress as well. He is very knowledgeable regarding the mattresses we were looking for and he spoke to us in such a way that not only did we understand the why of the way things were done the way they were but made the entire purchase process a relaxed and easy purchase from the beginning to delivery. Larry gave us all of the information we needed and was genuine, friendly, and above and beyond helpful. Larry encouraged us to truly picture the mattress being in our home and us sleeping on it every night. Larry is the reason that we will return to Gardner White on 14 Mile Road the next time we have furniture needs.
